comment.author: 92723869@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia]  The sepia photo is several minutes later. There are less boxes in the back of the cart at the left, and as the sun is travelling from left to right in the pictures, less shadow is falling on the spokes of the cart's right wheel making them more visible. The trams are not the same ones, though they're in almost the exact same position!
